query:
SELECT g.id, g.nome, u.email, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as num_lojas 
FROM gestores g 
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId 
GROUP BY g.id, g.nome, u.email;
command:

FROM gestores g 
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
